game.name: POSTAL 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Live a week in the life of "The POSTAL Dude"; a hapless everyman just trying to check off some chores. Buying milk, returning an overdue library book, getting Gary Coleman's autograph, what could possibly go wrong?

reviewHighlights.text: Pissed on a women and got a r kelly achievement. Next day i got suicide bombed by Osama Bin Laden. Greatest game ever 11/10
The best FPS out there. Darkly comedic, product of a time where offensive humor was still accepted and didn't get you canceled.
